name: I Scare Crows
description:
I Scare Crows

Protect your crops as a local scarecrow, gain coins based on how many crops survive and use them to replace any destroyed crops. But keep an eye on your hay counter, because without it you can't scare off the birds and cows trying to eat the crops.

How to play:

WASD Move Shift (hold) Sprint Z Interact with store or start the next wave

Credits:
